title: Enhancing My Professional Portfolio
description: Today, I focused on refining my professional portfolio to better reflect my extensive experience and skill set in software engineering. This involved transitioning my website to a React-based architecture, ensuring a more dynamic and responsive user experience. Key accomplishments included implementing a more robust deployment process, addressing potential npm and Node.js installation challenges, and integrating dynamic elements to improve site interactivity. Additionally, I streamlined the presentation of my professional background, emphasizing my expertise in cross-platform C++ application development, backend architecture, and my proactive approach to problem-solving.
